name: Tasteebuds.GitHub.io
body:
### TasteeBuds is a food outfit based in lagos state, Nigeria. It is owned by [Blessing Temitayo Adams](www.facebook.com/blessingtemidayo.igbafeadams)

We do soups and stews, fingerfoods, continental/intercontinental dishes, confectioneries and a lot more!

This site is currently under development so bear with us for the sparse documentation.
### Designer Templates
We’ve crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and click 'Continue to layouts' to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved.
![Food Pic](https://encrypted-tbn3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcREU6680O5sjpVJKlPiYKym11FGH-JRfbp89GvTEeomG0wnBJnl)

Should you need to communicate with us you can contact us via
@TasteeBuds


© 2016 Powered by [@Mac-Effect](@Omosofe)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
